TopicTitle: Does we ever get dedicated folder in ShadowPlay for KSP

Articles.Content: i wonder why KSP videos are saved in "desktop" folder while other games video have it''s own folders?

It used to save in a dedicated folder. but after I think update .25 something broke and now Shadowplay does not work right for KSP.

I have just got into the habit of manually moving my KSP recordings to a dedicated folder after recording.
Since this is not a KSP question but a Shadowplay question, moved to Space Lounge.
